value: A snapshot of the Anybeat online social network from 2013, before it was shut down. Nodes are users and links represent friendships. The edge direction (i, j) denotes the user i follows user j.
['M. Fire, R. Puzis, & Y. Elovici. \Link prediction in highly fractional data sets.\" In Handbook of Computational Approaches to Counterterrorism. Springer
